Some Text for the Modals Some Text for the Modals Some Text for the Modals Some Text for the Modals

01 First of all, we are here with the joy and excitement of bringing you a new NFT collection. We need to inform you about the foundations of this NFT collection. Although we are not an aid campaign. 02 We aim to raise awareness about the "Elephant Tusks" genocide in today's conditions and enable more people to have information about it. To show that there are many ways to spread this awareness and be a source of inspiration for many different projects, we decided to branch this project into different directions.
03 The first of these branches begins with a 3-season story that we have written for you. This story serves as a building block in raising the awareness needed for both our NFTs and elephants. Another of these branches is the game we developed, PeanutRush. 04 Based on platform game PeanutRush, the main character is an elephant, and they chase their favorite food, peanuts. With this game, we aim to bring the mentality of playing with and renting their collection pieces (with certain collection pieces in the Demo version) to our collectors and collector candidates.

FAQS
Why Elephant?
We aim to raise awareness about the "Elephant Tusks" genocide in today's conditions and enable more people to have information about it.
Do you give a gift to NFT?
NFT will be given as a gift in the DEMO version of the game. You can join our Discord channel to learn how to win these giveaway NFTs, which will be limited only.
Will everyone be able to play the game?
Anyone who owns an NFT will be able to play, if you are not an NFT owner, you can play the game by renting an NFT from any of the NFT owners.
Will there be a pre-sale?
The WhiteList sale will take place. You can find the details on our Discord channel.
How can I get whitelisted?
You can access the details on our Discord channel.
NFT mint prices?

Prices for WhiteList 0.11 ETH

Prices for public 0.55 ETH

How will I know how rare my NFT is?
NFT has special accessories. That's Dimond, Gold, Silver, and Bronze. We have a few surprises for rarity.
>Why should I buy your NFTs
With the leasing mechanics, you will be able to earn a side income from your NFTs.
When will the rental arrive?
NFT rental will come in Phase 3.
